name: TDPK GameJam Workshop 1
description:
Signup for the workshop here

This game is made with Godot for part of our up-coming TDPK GameJam in Bangkok.

We're running a workshop to get people interested in game design and development. The workshop consists of editing the game above in a hands on setting.

Installation

On most devices just extract the zip file somewhere and run by double clicking.

On OSX you should first double click the dmg and then right click on the game, and click open. This is because you have to pay to become a trusted software source.

Installing the development version

  1. Install Godot engine
  2. Download and extract the latest project sources or git clone
  3. Open Godot (Right click open if the first time)
  4. Click import and browse to your sources directory
  5. Double click on the project.godot file to open the sources
